GitHub CLI extension for managing PR comments

Usage:
  gh-comment [command]

Available Commands:
  add         Add a line-specific comment to a PR
  add-review  Add multiple comments as a batch review
  edit        Edit an existing comment
  help        Help about any command
  list        List all comments on a PR
  reply       Reply to a comment
  resolve     Resolve a review conversation
  submit-review Submit a pending review
  suggestions Expand suggestion syntax in comments

Flags:
  -h, --help      help for gh-comment
  -v, --verbose   Enable verbose output

Use "gh-comment [command] --help" for more information about a command.
